str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Vinegar, sour wine mixed with water, a common drink of Roman soldiers. From oxus; vinegar, i.e. Sour wine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A primary verb; to slant or slope, i.e. Incline or recline.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
